medical_history.chief_complaint: Left lower abdominal pain for 3 days.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain started as a dull pain and progressively became sharper and more severe. The greatest change in severity occurred yesterday morning after waking up. The patient also reports subjective fevers, anorexia, and a feeling of constipation, though his last bowel movement was today and described as loose. He denies nausea or vomiting. Additionally, the patient had mild episodes of left lower abdominal pain over the past year with attacks approximately every month, but they were never severe enough to seek medical attention.
medical_history.past_medical_history: GERD, gout (podagra), L knee arthroscopy & partial medial meniscectomy.
